author: SWuchterl
body:
**PR description:**

This PR is similar in spirit to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47017, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47045, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47079, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47107, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47136, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47191, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47224. It adds fillDescriptions (and applies light modification to modernize the source code) to a few EDProducers used at HLT for both Run 3 and Phase 2 used (among others) by the BTV POG.

See also this issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47275.

**PR validation:**

- `runTheMatrix.py -l limited` runs fine.

If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: add fillDescriptions to several BTV plugins used at HLT
